data.text: Hello my name is  Natalia I stay in this hotel and I like is so much most especially Sultan and Rose who help me through out the stay they are very fantasitic and I would love to recommend it to u all also I like the pool restaurant and food I really love it would come back again for sure
data.title: I like the Hotel I like the service most of all Sultan and Rose

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest, 
Thank you for choosing to stay at Premier Inn Dubai Barsha Heights & taking the time to write your review of our property, your comments are very much valued. 

We were glad to see that our hotel features, cleanliness, and staff hospitality have met your expectations, and you were so satisfied with our restaurant facilities and the food & drinks quality. 
Thank you for your generous appreciation over the service provided by our colleagues" Rose & Sultan", it is always rewarding to receive positive feedback from our guests. 

Looking forward to welcoming you back in the future. 

Best Regards, 
Ghada Mahgoub 
Operations Manager
owner_response.author: Ghada Mahgoub

data.text:
We booked this hotel as a budget option when in Dubai for a 2 day flight connection.
It was in a good location, although we thought too far to walk to the metro, especially when a taxi was so cheap. 

The room was clean, spacious and modern, the breakfast excellent and Mr Toad’s restaurant good value for Dubai and much easier than going out looking for somewhere to eat.

The only downside was as we’d booked direct with the hotel we were told we would be entitled to 20% discount on food/drink in the restaurant, when we enquired about this we were told that offer had finished, but at the end of our trip we stayed at another Dubai Premier Inn under the same terms and were given the discount?

All in all a good stay and would stay again
data.title: Best Premier Inn

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest, 

Thank you for choosing to stay at Premier Inn Dubai Barsha Heights & taking the time to write your review of our property, your comments are very much valued. 

We were glad to see that our hotel features, cleanliness, and staff hospitality have met your expectations, and you were so satisfied with our restaurant facilities and the food & drinks quality. 

We apologize for any confusion regarding the discount offer at our restaurant, Unfortunately not all the Premier Inn hotels have the same offers. Sorry once more for this inconvenince. 

Thank you once more for your input and We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Best Regards,
Ghada Mahgoub
Operations Manager
owner_response.author: Ghada Mahgoub

data.text: Premier Inn exceeded all expectations. The staff were not just friendly but professional, making my stay incredibly comfortable. Thanks to Arwa for smooth check-in, welcoming and helpful throughout my stay, and housekeeping for maintaining spotless rooms. Top ambience and brilliant hospitality .Everything is nearby you can easily move around beautifully Dubai!
data.title: Arwa from reception

data.text: A hotel worth recommending.  Everything from the reception, through the restaurant, to the cleaning staff is of the highest standard (Hazem is a very nice and polite man).  The stars in this case do not reflect the hospitality you receive in this hotel. 5 star.
data.title: Great stay.

data.text: Everything is impressive cleaned. Hazem the housekeeper does a great job.  I would return without thinking it twice. Fantastic people and fantastic service. Rooms veryyyy clean. The front desk team, very helpful and professional. No complaints at all
data.title: Wonderful
